column4: Has anyone gotten Warcraft III Frozen Throne to work? I got RoC to work but not frozen throne. It complains of "needing a disk"
simply download the .NET framework in wine
My browser isn't working im not sure why, but if you go to google and type in Wine HQ and look up the topic under WC3 Frozen Throne there is a link in there.
NO! I tried to use use an .exe on Linux! /sarcasm
did you use it in the terminal and if so what error messages are you getting?
Well no I tried for it on the Win siute
How should I get it? Synaptic?
I simply downloaded the link posted on Wine HQ and right clicked and specified other program and typed in WINE it worked great =/.
I wish I could be of more help, but I cant even browse the internet, and maybe it is related to my cdrom drive not mounting
